SEARCH
Package view

Class MenuView

java.lang.Object
view.MenuView
public class MenuView extends Object
Constructs the main menu for the game, allowing players to input settings such as player names, paddle dimensions, ball characteristics, and the winning score. This class binds user inputs to the game configuration, leveraging the MenuController for game initialization and parameter validation.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    MenuView(MenuController controller)
    Initializes a new menu view with user-configurable settings for the game.

  • Constructor Details

    • MenuView

      public MenuView(MenuController controller)
      Initializes a new menu view with user-configurable settings for the game. Sets up UI components and binds them to the provided MenuController.
      Parameters:
      controller - The controller responsible for handling the logic based on user input.

  • Method Details

    • getLayout

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox getLayout()
      Gets the layout of the menu, containing all UI components.
      Returns:
      The VBox containing the layout of the menu.

    • getConfirm

      public javafx.beans.property.BooleanProperty getConfirm()
      Retrieves the property indicating whether game settings have been confirmed.
      Returns:
      A BooleanProperty that is true if settings are confirmed, otherwise false.

    • handleActions

      public void handleActions()
      Configures actions for the 'exit' and 'confirm' buttons. 'exit' triggers application termination, while 'confirm' validates and processes input, updating game settings via the controller.

    • processTextFieldString

      public String processTextFieldString(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Processes and validates the text from a TextField as a String. Displays an error and returns an empty string if the input is invalid.
      Parameters:
      textField - The TextField containing the input string.
      Returns:
      The validated string, or an empty string if validation fails.

    • processTextFieldDouble

      public double processTextFieldDouble(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Processes and validates the text from a TextField as a double. Displays an error message if the input is invalid or negative.
      Parameters:
      textField - The TextField containing the input string.
      Returns:
      The validated double value, or 0.0 if validation fails.

    • processTextFieldInt

      public int processTextFieldInt(javafx.scene.control.TextField textField)
      Processes and validates the text from a TextField as an integer. Displays an error message if the input is invalid or negative.
      Parameters:
      textField - The TextField containing the input string.
      Returns:
      The validated integer value, or 0 if validation fails.
